title: Close to Santana Row and Valley Fair ~ Check Out This 1x1!
posting_body: ['Orchard Glen Apartments', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x106', '1 \xa0bedroom 1 bath 725Sq.', 'Ft.  From $2,794/mo', '* Unit 4304 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 2328 - Available 08/20/22', 'Everyday amenities for luxury living—contemporary apartment homes at Orchard Glen in Santa Clara.', 'This one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Orchard Glen Apartments is ready for move-in!', 'This pet-friendly floor plan features a large living room with neutral tone walls and plush carpeting.', 'Select homes come with a wood-burning fireplace for added comfort.', 'Admire the view of the neighborhood from a private patio.', 'Enjoy meals with family and friends in the separate dining area next to the galley kitchen, which comes with GE appliances and wood-like flooring.', 'Appreciate the extra storage space with two closets in the bedroom and the convenience of a stackable washer and dryer at the end of the hallway.', 'Along with your new home, you will have access to the neighborhood amenities, such as the oversized saltwater pool and spa.', 'Guest services are also available, including twenty-four-hour package locker systems and high-speed Internet access.', 'Speak with an Orchard Glen Apartments leasing agent to learn more!', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* Floor - Third', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '* ClubHouse', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* CoverPark', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* NightPatrol', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '* Availability24Hours', '* PackageReceiving', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* Sundeck', '* SmokeFree', '* WirelessInternet', '* Transportation', '* Pool', '* Spa', '* BusinessCenter', 'MANAGED BY:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x106', 'Address:', '101 Saratoga Ave Santa Clara, CA 95051', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
